title: An endorsement from Mr. John C. Wright
author: VD
content_html: A Vote for the International Lord of Hate is a Vote Against Lugubrious Puppies! Vote early, vote often, vote MONSTER HUNTER NEMESIS.
content_text:
A Vote for the International Lord of Hate is a Vote Against Lugubrious Puppies! Vote early, vote often,
vote MONSTER HUNTER NEMESIS
